description: Mobile techniques used by Judy, ATT&CK software S0325 v1.0
name: Judy (S0325)

techniques.comment: [Judy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0325) bypasses Google Play's protections by downloading a malicious payload at runtime after installation.(Citation: CheckPoint-Judy)
[Judy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0325) uses infected devices to generate fraudulent clicks on advertisements to generate revenue.(Citation: CheckPoint-Judy)
